ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] New games
ygData.msgSnippet: Can you describe the game a little bit?  I m not sure if I would have time to play another MMORPG like EQ since it takes up so much of my time, and money..but
ygData.messageBody:
Can you describe the game a little bit?  I'm not sure if I would have time to play another MMORPG like EQ since it takes up so much of my time, and money..but I'm willing to try it out.  You guys are gonna have alot of competion with other games such as World of Warcraft, SWG, and all the various other titles out there.  But good luck though.
 
Dabruiser Troll <Death Alliance>
Warrior of the 29th Season
-----Original Message-----
From: soulfire18_01 [mailto:soulfire18_01@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 13, 2003 1:26 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] New games

Im gonna be working with some ppl that i know that are gonna be
creating a new game based around everquest there is no name for the
game as of yet but i was wondering if any of you would be willing to
spend your money and you time playing another game that is alot like
everquest.

Qanaesin Truehearted
Vicar of the 52nd Season
Vallon Zek server



"If your stupid and slow im gonna let you die" - Qanaesin
